Posts.Title: new, with lumps and very worried larnie larnie

Posts.Content: larnie wrote: hi everyone. thanks for giving me somewhere to vent all my emotions, i feel when i talk about it, friends and family think im a hypocondriact! im almost 23 years old. i have one 18 mnth old son. over a month ago now i decided to do my first breast exam. i was totally shocked when i found 2 large (maybe 3 cm's) lumps on my right breast and several small pea sized lumps on my left. its the right side that i am worried about. i went to the dr's and he didnt seem too worried, but is sending me to get a u/s. so i am having that on wednesday, followed by a ultrasound on my belly and pelvis the next day(another problem i think) im starting to worry more, because after staying the same weight for months and months now, i have suddenly lost 6 kgs(without even trying) in a matter of about 2 weeks. i also have been feeling nausious( could have something to do with watever is wrong with my stomach). its all so worrying. and im kinda over everyone telling me its stupid to worry about it, and that they know its gonna be fine! how do they know?? i know im only almost 23, but, i have lumps where they shouldnt be. i feel like they have no right to tell me not to worry, even thou they are only caring i guess. anyway thats my vent over. any advice or thoughts are very welcomed! btw, im a aussie, if my lingo is at all weird to you guys let me know and i will translate Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: new, with lumps and very worried larnie larnie

Posts.Content: Feb 25, 2007 03:06PM larnie wrote: i will, thanks girls!!
